data.what_is: A centralized internal e-commerce platform tailor made for multi-unit brands, franchises & vendors such as printers that work with many brands.  SAAS Product with 4 key modules, Location Master, Commerce Cloud, Campaign Manager, & Marketing Kit Builder.   Our product streamlines complex bulk ordering requests from field & franchise operators for their merchandising, marketing materials, digital assets, and important documents across hundreds of locations.  We house store 'DNA' details about every store which provides the foundation to error proof ordering across hundreds of stores and with complex rules that pertain to each location. We are an internal ecommerce platform & we operate in the distributed marketing space.
data.product_description: A centralized internal e-commerce platform tailor made for multi-unit brands, franchises & vendors such as printers that work with many brands.  SAAS Product with 4 key modules, Location Master, Commerce Cloud, Campaign Manager, & Marketing Kit Builder.   Our product streamlines complex bulk ordering requests from field & franchise operators for their merchandising, marketing materials, digital assets, and important documents across hundreds of locations.  We house store 'DNA' details about every store which provides the foundation to error proof ordering across hundreds of stores and with complex rules that pertain to each location. We are an internal ecommerce platform & we operate in the distributed marketing space.
